# Markdown Documentation

This directory contains the converted documentation from the Hugo project.

## Structure

- `/docs` - All markdown documentation files (with original directory structure)
- `/images` - All images referenced in the documentation

## Usage

You can view these markdown files with any markdown reader or editor. All internal links between documents and image references have been updated to work with the new structure using relative paths.
